trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for accessing the types, directives, and controls in the current Web project document.
trans-unit.target: 提供基底類別，以供存取目前 Web 專案文件中的型別、指示詞和控制項。

trans-unit.source: This class must be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別必須被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> base class is implemented by designer hosts to provide access to types, directives, and user controls defined in a Web project document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager>基底類別由提供存取權類型、 指示詞和 Web 專案文件中定義的使用者控制項的設計工具主機所實作。

trans-unit.source: A control designer class can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> to access the definitions in the current document, and to add a new tag prefix to the current document.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的設計工具類別可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager>來存取在目前的文件中定義，並將新的標記前置詞加入至目前的文件。

trans-unit.source: You access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> services supplied by the designer host through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.ReferenceManager%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 您存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager>透過設計工具主應用程式所提供的服務<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.ReferenceManager%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> implementation can be accessed in two ways:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>實作可存取有兩種：

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A> property to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> implementation supplied by the designer host.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A>屬性來存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>設計工具主應用程式所提供的實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> implementation is supplied through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.ReferenceManager%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager>透過提供實作<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.ReferenceManager%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Other designer classes can access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> implementation by first obtaining the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> services implementation through the designer component's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>, and then calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.GetDesigner%2A> method using the designer host <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.RootComponent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 其他設計工具類別可以存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>實作第一個取得<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>服務透過設計工具元件的實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>，然後呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.GetDesigner%2A>方法使用設計工具主應用程式<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.RootComponent%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> replaces the obsolete interface <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormReferenceManager>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> 取代過時介面<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormReferenceManager>。

trans-unit.source: Older designer hosts may only support the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormReferenceManager> interface implementation.
trans-unit.target: 舊版設計工具的主機可能只支援<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormReferenceManager>介面實作。

trans-unit.source: Check that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> implementations supplied by the designer host are not `null` to ensure the designer host implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> classes.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager>設計工具主應用程式所提供的實作不`null`以確保設計工具主應用程式實作<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> class is abstract, you cannot create an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> directly using the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager>類別是抽象的您無法建立的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager>直接使用建構函式。

trans-unit.source: When deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> class, override the constructor to implement custom initialization actions for your reference manager implementation.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager>類別，覆寫建構函式來實作您參考管理員實作的自訂初始化動作。

trans-unit.source: Gets the register directives for the current project document.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前專案文件的註冊指示詞。

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings representing the register directives defined in the current document.
trans-unit.target: 字串 (String) 集合，表示目前文件中定義的註冊指示詞。

trans-unit.source: The type of the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the tag prefix for the specified object type.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定物件型別的標記前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The tag prefix for the specified object type, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定之物件型別的標記前置詞 (如果找到)，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The tag prefix of the type to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取型別的標記前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The tag name of the type to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取型別的標記名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object type with the specified tag prefix and tag name.
trans-unit.target: 取得具有指定標記前置詞和標記名稱的物件型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object with the specified tag prefix and name, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定標記前置詞和名稱之物件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> (如果找到)，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The tag prefix of the user control to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取使用者控制項的標記前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The tag name of the user control to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之使用者控制項的標記名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the relative URL path for the user control with the specified tag prefix and tag name.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者控制項 (具有指定的標記前置詞和標記名稱) 的相對 URL 路徑。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the relative URL path for the specified user control, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串 (如果找到)，表示指定使用者控制項的相對 URL 路徑，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager.GetUserControlPath%2A> uses the tag prefix and name to locate the user control register directive in the current document, and returns the `src` attribute value defined in the register directive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager.GetUserControlPath%2A> 在目前的文件中找出使用者控制項註冊指示詞中使用的標記前置詞和名稱，並傳回`src`屬性定義的 register 指示詞中的值。

trans-unit.source: The type to add a tag prefix for in the current document.
trans-unit.target: 要在目前文件中加入標記前置詞的型別。

trans-unit.source: Adds a tag prefix for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 加入指定型別的標記前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The tag prefix string.
trans-unit.target: 標記前置詞字串。

trans-unit.source: If the tag prefix already exists, then a new register directive is not added.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經存在的標記前置詞，並不會加入新的登錄指示詞。
